action.action-desc: Mr. Stivers (for himself and Ms. Bass) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To require the Comptroller General of the United States to submit to the Congress a report on adoption disruption and dissolution in the United States.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Securing American Families Everywhere (SAFE Kids) Act.

section.header: Study on adoption disruption and dissolution
section.text: Within 2 years after the date of the enactment of this Act, the Comptroller General of the United States shall submit to the Congress a written report thatâ€”

paragraph.text: recommends legislation to define adoption disruption and adoption dissolution, to prevent adoption disruption and adoption dissolution, and require State and local governments and child welfare agencies to track and report on disrupted or dissolved adoptions; and
sets forth legislative options to prepare prospective adoptive parents for adoption and to support adoptive parents after an adoption.
